messages.content:
I found the T‑shirt you ordered last month (Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt, product_id P030) and added two more to your cart.

Current status
- Product: Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt (P030)
- Unit price: $17.28
- Quantity added: 2
- Subtotal for those 2: $34.56
- Note: Your cart still contains other items (TechBrand Wireless Mouse, Backpack, Electric Toothbrush). When I attempted checkout I selected only the two T‑shirts.

Problem blocking completion
- The checkout requires account verification (a one‑time password/OTP). I attempted to run the account verification step, but that verification action isn’t available to me from here, so I can’t finish the purchase.

How you can proceed (choose one)
1) You complete the verification and checkout yourself — I’ve already added the 2 shirts to the cart and selected them for checkout, so you only need to enter the OTP on the checkout page. (There’s an OTP email in your inbox from the shopping platform.)
2) If you want me to continue, I can guide you step‑by‑step through entering the OTP and finishing checkout.
3) I can adjust the cart first (change quantity, remove other items, apply a discount code) before you complete checkout — tell me what you want changed.
4) If you prefer, I can prepare an email to someone (or send you a checklist) to complete the purchase manually.

Quick question before you decide
- Do you want any specific size or color for the two shirts, or should I order the same as your previous purchase?

Tell me which option you want and provide the size/color if needed, and I’ll continue accordingly.
